p: The highest antioxidant activity (48.19 ± 0.1 mmol/L TROLOX) was obtained using young shoot (sample 4 Sh collected in June) essential oil. The older the plant, the lower ability of oil to scavenge free radicals (30.35 ± 0.03 and 16.25 ± 0.2 mmol/L for shoot oils 7 Sh and 8 Sh of plants collected in autumn) was determined.
